channel.title: Item slots
channel.description: hey, i need a bit of help. i was wondering where you would go to change the slot an item would go into when wearing it. ex: skill capes go into weapon slots. its obvious where i want em to go...thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2008, 09:17:05 AM[/size][hr]nvm i figured it out, stupid of me to NOT know.....oh but oh hey wow thanks for all your help guys. well appreciated.....this is why i come here :)

item.title: Item slots
